talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter: To this day I remain pretty convinced that this person (who I had actually paid to review V1) got bored and quit halfway through and didn't want to admit it, because their review just straight up does not mention the cult stuff *at all* lol.

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter: Cuz like even and perhaps *especially* if you don't like Otherside Picnic V1, I feel like Sorawo just casually dropping "oh yeah my family got wrapped up in a cult, nearly killed me and all died" all at once feels like the sort of thing that ought to define a lot of your feelings about it!

talk.author: did:plc:uypytbqy5palhmhbvvezgrww
talk.utter:
Right? If you DON'T like the book or the characters, that's very much a "oh come ON" moment, haha.

Didn't you also say they never even mentioned Toriko directly? Which also seems wild to me.
